He zoomed right down and struck at the neck.

Sunhawk:  DEATH TO ALL PREDICONS!  YOU WILL ALL PAY A
HUNDRED FOLD FOR KILLIN SNOWOWL AND TAKING MY LIFE
FROM ME! AND SHAMING MY NAME FOREVER!

--- Jonathan <jhogan@...> wrote:
> 
> > Sunhawk suspected he would be followed which was
> why
> > he started out in another direction and circled
> > around, but just in case he kept monitoring the
> > ground.  Shortly before he was going to turn he
> spoted
> > a figure.  Probably and animal, but he wasn't
> sure.
> > He went to robot mode and a laser sword poped out
> of
> > his wrist compartment.  He dropped straight at
> > Nightshade.
> >
> > OOC: I had posted that when he was on the ground
> and
> > Nightshade was trying to flank him he planted a
> > grenade where he was likely to step on it as he
> moved.
> >
> 
> OOC: And Nightshade is a demolitions expert you
> think a dropped mine WHILE
> SHE'S WATCHING YOU is gonna get her? Pffft.
> 
> {Nightshade}
> 
>     Nightshade sat back on her haunchs when the
> flyer turned and began to
> descend towards her, her eyes watching his movements
> casually not in the
> least bit worried about the sword he already had
> out. He was a maximal
> afterall, and attacking an unarmed unaggressive
> enemy was as impossible to
> their nature as was genocide.
> 
>     Sitting back relaxed she waited for him to
> approach.
> 
> 
>
